Locations.name: Dark Forest
Locations.description: A dense, shadowy forest with towering trees and an eerie silence. The air is thick with the scent of pine and damp earth.

exits.N: You cannot go there because there's a huge wall blocking the way.
exits.S: You cannot go there because there's a huge wall blocking the way.
exits.E: You cannot go there because there's a huge wall blocking the way.
exits.W: You cannot go there because there's a huge wall blocking the way.

items.name: Rusty Sword
items.description: An old, corroded sword that has seen better days. It might still be useful in a fight.

items.name: Healing Herb
items.description: A small bundle of medicinal herbs. Can be used to restore a small amount of health.

fixtures.name: Old Oak Tree
fixtures.description: A massive oak tree with gnarled branches. Carved into its bark are strange symbols.

fixtures.name: Broken Cart
fixtures.description: A wooden cart, overturned and splintered. It looks like it was abandoned in a hurry.
